message.content: {"id": "11280", "title": "Bug 11280 - Switching perspectives loses view maximized state", "description": "When switching perspectives from Java to Resource and then back to Java, the maximized state of the CVS repository view is lost.", "OB": "The CVS repository view should remain maximized after switching perspectives.", "EB": "The CVS repository view is no longer maximized after switching perspectives.", "SR": "To fix this issue, ensure that the maximized state of the CVS repository view is maintained when switching perspectives."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '11280', 'title': 'Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective.2. Double click the title bar to maximize it3. Switch to the resource perspective.4. Come back to the Java perspective. '}
